class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, hCut: List[int], vCut: List[int]) -> int:
        hCut.sort(reverse=True)
        vCut.sort(reverse=True)
        h_idx = 0
        v_idx = 0
        h_pcs = 1
        v_pcs = 1
        cost = 0
        while h_idx < len(hCut) and v_idx < len(vCut):
            if hCut[h_idx] >= vCut[v_idx]:
                cost += hCut[h_idx] * v_pcs
                h_pcs += 1
                h_idx += 1
            else:
                cost += vCut[v_idx] * h_pcs
                v_pcs += 1
                v_idx += 1
        while h_idx < len(hCut):
            cost += hCut[h_idx] * v_pcs
            h_idx += 1
        while v_idx < len(vCut):
            cost += vCut[v_idx] * h_pcs
            v_idx += 1
        return cost
